forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
